title: Redesign Weekly Menu page with category-based suggestions
description:
Replace the day-based weekly menu with category-based dish suggestions that help users discover what to cook.

## Categories

1. **Reliable Favorites** - timesCooked >= 5, made within last 60 days
2. **Blast from the Past** - timesCooked >= 3, last made 60+ days ago
3. **Give It Another Shot** - timesCooked 1-2, last made 30+ days ago
4. **Cuisine You're Missing** - Cuisine not cooked in 14+ days

## Requirements

- Show 2-3 dishes per category
- Shuffle button per category to get different suggestions
- "Plan this meal" button on each dish to schedule it
- Remove all day-based UI elements
- Keep the page useful for planning a week's meals
